title: Honor System - How can I track my honor progress?
body:
Hey I was wondering if this is going to be in a patch anytime soon, but I wanted to ask if tracking your honor progress will be able to be accessible because we have no way of telling how far we're from achieving level 3 honor for example. Riot might already have started to work on this but maybe it could be solved like the mastery system? If I'm just blind and haven't noticed it then please let me know xd 
~~w0lftamer {{champion:203}}

replies.body: With Honor being such a new system that's meant to promote teamwork, we didn't want players to feel that the system was "grindy". If we had a sort of experience bar for Honor, a lot of people would feel pressured to grind honors and possibly beg others to be honored. It's something we might be able to add in the future, but I don't have any info on that yet.
